desc: Students develop more advanced technique in writing for instruments and voice through individual study in creative composition, focusing on smaller ensembles. May be repeated. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: MUSIC 223.
name: Composition II

revisions.desc: Students develop more advanced technique in writing for instruments and voice through individual study in creative composition, focusing on smaller ensembles. May be repeated. Generally offered each semester. Prerequisite: MUSIC 223.
